title: Woman with Shawl
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
description: Woman dressed in Turkik costume with floral printed bloomers, ornate blouse and vest, holding large shawl which covers top of her head up off of shoulders; standing on oval base.
name: Figure
